mdRecord.dcterms:title: Law School Law Day 1964
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Law School alumni at dedication of portrait of Hardy C. Dillard, Class of 1927, fourth Dean of the School of Law [1963-1968]. Identified: Hardy C. Dillard (far left); Walter L. Brown, Class of 1926 (next to speaker); Albertis S. Harrison, Jr. Class of 1928, Governor of Virginia [1962-1968] (right)
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
